Column1: Pradeep to Iftikhar Ahmed, FOUR, Pakistan win by 5 wickets. This is their highest successful chase in the last three years. Only the second time they have chased over 275 in the last five years. Another bad delivery from Pradeep and that is enough for Iftikhar to seal the game. Full and down leg, Iftikhar stays put in the crease and glances it fine of short fine leg

Pradeep to Iftikhar Ahmed, SIX, oh no! Pradeep chose a poor time to deliver a full toss. It was just above the knee and at a perfect height for Iftikhar, who helps it all the way over fine leg for a maximum
Jayasuriya to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, slower and outside off, Iftikhar drops it into the off-side and retains strike
Jayasuriya to Riaz, 1 run, flighted delivery and Riaz slog sweeps it on the bounce to deep mid-wicket

Jayasuriya to Haris Sohail, out Bowled!! Bowled 'im! Sohail cannot believe it. He stands there in disbelief and asks his partner whether he's really bowled. Nothing but a straight ball to which Sohail makes room to carve it into the off-side, misses and the ball hits the top of off-stump. Jayasuriya generally darts it in and he defeated the batsman because of his pace there. Sohail has taken Pakistan close to victory and now it is up to others to take them over the line. Haris Sohail b Jayasuriya 56(50) [4s-3 6s-1]
Jayasuriya to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, goes back and across to nurdle the off-break backward of square
Jayasuriya to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, slower and turning in, Iftikhar defends it adjacent to the wicket on the off-side
Jayasuriya to Haris Sohail, 1 run, drifting in from round the wicket and Sohail eases it to long-on
Pradeep to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, very full and close to yorker length, Iftikhar squeezes it back to Pradeep
Pradeep to Haris Sohail, 1 run, slower delivery and Sohail wrists it away to long-on

Pradeep to Haris Sohail, FOUR, that's superbly played by Sohail. He was backing away and had to really reach out to this low full toss, he bends down and gets there, opens the bat face and places it behind point for a boundary
Pradeep to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, fuller than a good length and Iftikhar drives on the rise to sweeper cover
Pradeep to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, slower ball now outside off, Iftikhar steers it straight to short third man
Pradeep to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, starts with a yorker right at the stumps, jammed out to the right of Pradeep
Lahiru Kumara to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, very full delivery close to yorker length, Iftikhar squeezes it past extra cover and retains strike

Lahiru Kumara to Iftikhar Ahmed, FOUR, Kumara is all over the place. This is the match-changing over. Full and plenty of room outside off, Iftikhar brings those fast hands into play and nails the square drive, no chance for deep point or deep extra cover to stop that

Lahiru Kumara to Iftikhar Ahmed, FOUR, this is poor from Kumara. He bangs it in and does not have the pace to trouble the batsman, Iftikhar swivels on the front foot and pulls it with a wrist roll backward of square, bisecting the two fielders in the deep comfortably

Lahiru Kumara to Haris Sohail, 1 run, fifty for Sohail. Misbah knows the importance of this knock as he stands up and applauds. No celebration from Sohail as he just lifts his bat up to acknowledge. Low full toss outside off, Sohail eases it to sweeper cover
Lahiru Kumara to Haris Sohail, 2 runs, tries to follow the left hander with a full delivery on the pads, flicked away to deep mid-wicket and the fielder does well to move across and stop the boundary

Lahiru Kumara to Haris Sohail, SIX, that's why Sohail is the key. He can play the big shots when needed. Pakistan needed it badly as it had been 37 balls since a boundary off the bat. He moves away to the leg-side and even though it is banged in halfway down, Sohail flat-bats it over wide long-off for half a dozen
Jayasuriya to Iftikhar Ahmed, 2 runs, quicker and outside off, Iftikhar opens the bat face and eases it past point, the fielder doesn't dive and hence the second is taken

Jayasuriya to Iftikhar Ahmed, leg byes, FOUR, good thinking but not the best of execution. He saw the advance and decided to fire it down leg, Iftikhar got a deflection off the pad and it runs away to the fine leg fence
Jayasuriya to Haris Sohail, 1 run, 105.2kph dart and Sohail lofts it on the bounce to long-off
Jayasuriya to Haris Sohail, no run, comes down the track and is met by a quicker delivery, knocks it to the left of Jayasuriya
Jayasuriya to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, quicker and around off, Iftikhar moves across and punches it to long-on
Jayasuriya to Haris Sohail, 1 run, flighted outside off, Sohail's forward push ends up near long-off
Pradeep to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, short of length outside off, Iftikhar mistimes the punch towards point. Just the single off the over and the asking rate has gone past 7.5
Pradeep to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, back of a length on off, Iftikhar knocks it down the wicket

Pradeep to Haris Sohail, 1 run, in the air and safe.. The pressure showing on Sohail as well. He is hurried by the short ball and he splices the pull straight up, luckily for him the fielder at mid-on is on the boundary and the other fielders cannot get there
Pradeep to Haris Sohail, no run, bouncer angled in and Sohail takes evasive action, he ducks underneath it and evades it. Three dots..
Pradeep to Haris Sohail, no run, back of a length outside off, Sohail punches it to mid-off - straight to the fielder
Pradeep to Haris Sohail, no run, starts from round the wicket with a short of length delivery, punched straight to mid-off
Jayasuriya to Haris Sohail, 1 run, tossed up around off, Sohail punches it down to long-on
Jayasuriya to Haris Sohail, no run, fraction short and outside off, Sohail cracks the cut straight to backward point
Jayasuriya to Haris Sohail, 2 runs, comes down the track and lofts it with the spin over extra cover, two added
Jayasuriya to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, straying down leg, Iftikhar bends low and sweeps it to long leg
Jayasuriya to Haris Sohail, 1 run, shuffles across and works it against the spin to long-on
Jayasuriya to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, tossed up on off, Iftikhar drives it down to long-on
Lahiru Kumara to Haris Sohail, no run, 148.5kph bouncer on off-stump, Sohail ducks and evades it
Lahiru Kumara to Haris Sohail, no run, slower delivery outside off and Sohail steers it straight to backward point
Lahiru Kumara to Iftikhar Ahmed, 1 run, short of length delivery and Iftikhar nails the pull straight to deep mid-wicket
Lahiru Kumara to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, full and attacking the stumps, Iftikhar turns it to mid-on
Lahiru Kumara to Iftikhar Ahmed, no run, good length ball and Iftikhar brings his bat down hurriedly to keep it out

Lahiru Kumara to Sarfaraz, out Bowled!! Cleaned up! Silence at the National Stadium. Sri Lanka are still in this. Back of a length delivery that cramps the batsman for room, Sarfaraz wanted to guide it to third man but since he didn't have the space to meet the ball, he inside edged it onto the stumps. Kumara is elated with that wicket as he lets out a roar. Sarfaraz b Lahiru Kumara 23(33) [4s-1]

Jayasuriya to Haris Sohail, 2 runs, smart batting from Sohail. There are vast vacant spaces on the both sides and he just places it into one of them and pockets a brace. Flighted outside off, Sohail opens the bat face and directs it past point, by the time the sweeper got across the second was taken
Jayasuriya to Sarfaraz, 1 run, they are happy to take the single, fifth one of the over and this one is down to long-on
Jayasuriya to Haris Sohail, 1 run, flighted around off, Sohail opens the bat face to maneuver into the off-side
Jayasuriya to Sarfaraz, 1 run, tossed up on off, Sarfaraz eases the drive to long-on
Jayasuriya to Haris Sohail, 1 run, flatter delivery sliding in from round the wicket and Sohail punches it to long-on
Jayasuriya to Sarfaraz, 1 run, spins in sharply and Sarfaraz did not expect it, went for the drive and squirted an inside edge onto the pad, the ball rolls into the off-side and the duo cross over
Lahiru Kumara to Haris Sohail, no run, Lahiru Kumara nails the yorker, Haris Sohail gets his bat down just in time and defends it back to the bowler
Lahiru Kumara to Sarfaraz, 1 run, length delivery around off, Sarfaraz steers it away to third man
Lahiru Kumara to Sarfaraz, no run, slower delivery on a short of length, Sarfaraz wanted to upper cut it over the keeper's end. But he didn't pick the slower one and was way early into the shot
Lahiru Kumara to Haris Sohail, 1 run, very full delivery attacking the stumps, Haris Sohail flicks it to mid-on
Lahiru Kumara to Haris Sohail, no run, fuller length delivery on the stumps, Haris Sohail flicks it straight to mid-wicket
Lahiru Kumara to Sarfaraz, 1 run, stays in the crease and pulls it away to deep square leg
Wanidu Hasaranga to Sarfaraz, 1 run, knocks it down the ground to long-on
Wanidu Hasaranga to Sarfaraz, 2 runs, spinning away from Sarfaraz, he outside edges the push and ends up wide of short third man
Wanidu Hasaranga to Sarfaraz, FOUR, that's a juicy full-toss from Wanidu Hasaranga, Sarfaraz thumps it to deep mid-wicket for a boundary. The ball deserved the punishment!
Wanidu Hasaranga to Haris Sohail, 1 run, spins in and tucks it to backward square leg

Wanidu Hasaranga to Haris Sohail, no run, Haris Sohail plays for the spin, it didn't turn much hence he ends up playing inside the line of the ball. And it goes past the outside edge. Haris Sohail in trying to defend that left the crease and Bhanuka missed a clear stumping chance
Wanidu Hasaranga to Sarfaraz, 1 run, googly starts from wide of off, Sarfaraz reads it off the pitch and pushes it away to the off-side

Shanaka to Haris Sohail, FOUR, wow! That's a serious cricket shot from Haris Sohail who in every innings does something to prove that he is a serious cricketer. Stands tall, shuffles slightly to the on-side to manufacture room and punched it wide of cover. No one moved!
Shanaka to Haris Sohail, 2 runs, stands tall and cuts it past the backward point fielder. He will come back for a second
Shanaka to Sarfaraz, 1 run, driven down the ground, it finds the mid-on fielder and they will take a single
Shanaka to Sarfaraz, no run, flicked to mid-wicket where Gunathilaka dives and stops it from going further
Shanaka to Haris Sohail, 1 run, full and wide of off, Haris Sohail drives it away to sweeper cover

Shanaka to Sarfaraz, leg byes, 1 run, 129.7 kph delivery on the stumps, Sarfaraz misses the tuck and it struck him onto his pads. Sliding down leg so there wasn't appeal for lbw. It deflects away to the on-side
Wanidu Hasaranga to Haris Sohail, no run, it pitches around leg and spins down further, Haris Sohail eases it straight to mid-wicket
Wanidu Hasaranga to Sarfaraz, 1 run, leggie around off, Sarfaraz stays back and punches it to long-off
Wanidu Hasaranga to Haris Sohail, 1 run, driven past bowler for another run
Wanidu Hasaranga to Sarfaraz, 1 run, straight bat push to long-on
Wanidu Hasaranga to Sarfaraz, no run, stays put and carves it away to backward point
Wanidu Hasaranga to Haris Sohail, 1 run, 85.7 leggie on the stumps, Haris Sohail goes back and whips it to deep mid-wicket
Shanaka to Sarfaraz, no run, length delivery on the stumps, Sarfaraz stays in the crease and blocks it to the off-side
Shanaka to Haris Sohail, 1 run, dabs it to third man

Shanaka to Haris Sohail, 2 runs, opens the face of the bat nicely and guides it wide of third man for another couple. Three two's in a row for Haris Sohail and Pakistan. This must be frustrating for Sri Lanka
Shanaka to Haris Sohail, 2 runs, stays put and punches it square of the wicket, he will come back for a double again
Shanaka to Haris Sohail, 2 runs, throws this one wide of off, Haris Sohail saw the width and threw his bat at it. He gets it wide of sweeper cover and will come back for a brace
Shanaka to Haris Sohail, no run, full and attacking the stumps, Haris Sohail pushes it to cover

Wanidu Hasaranga to Sarfaraz, no run, a brilliant wrong 'un to end the over. Sarfaraz was late in picking it up hence he reacted a touch late, he plays it down the wrong line and ends up inside edging it back onto the pad
Wanidu Hasaranga to Sarfaraz, no run, full and wide of off, Sarfaraz presses forward and defends it to the off-side
Wanidu Hasaranga to Sarfaraz, no run, it was short enough to be cut but Sarfaraz ends up hitting it too hard and in the process mistiming it to cover
Wanidu Hasaranga to Haris Sohail, 1 run, now, a wrong'un, Haris Sohail stays put and pushes it away wide of cover
Wanidu Hasaranga to Haris Sohail, 2 runs, goes back in the crease and works it wide of deep backward square leg for a brace
Wanidu Hasaranga to Sarfaraz, 1 run, knocks it down to long-off

Pradeep to Haris Sohail, FOUR, the fielding has clearly not been of the international standards today. It was a yorker on the stumps and Haris Sohail flicked it away wide of deep mid-wicket. Jayasuriya reached there but gets down in a lazy fashion and allows it to go through for a boundary. Very very poor as it releases the pressure!
Pradeep to Haris Sohail, no run, very full and targeting the stumps, Haris Sohail eases it away to mid-on
Pradeep to Sarfaraz, 1 run, fuller length delivery on the pads, Sarfaraz tucks it to backward square leg
Pradeep to Haris Sohail, 1 run, length delivery around off, Haris Sohail taps it to cover point with soft hands and takes a quick single
Pradeep to Sarfaraz, 1 run, opens the face of the bat to guide it third man

Pradeep to Sarfaraz, no run, length delivery around off, Sarfaraz punches it straight to the bowler. Pradeep picks it up and throws it at Sarfaraz in anger. It misses him and Bhanuka has to dive to his left to stop it from going to the fence
Sandakan to Haris Sohail, 2 runs, goes back on that wrong 'un and punches it to sweeper cover for a brace
Sandakan to Haris Sohail, no run, flighted and very full, Haris Sohail wanted to drive it through cover, ends up inside edging it to short fine leg
Sandakan to Sarfaraz, 1 run, knocks it down the ground to long-on
Sandakan to Sarfaraz, no run, full and on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
Sandakan to Sarfaraz, no run, defends it to the off-side

Sandakan to Haris Sohail, 1 run, sharp spin on that wrong 'un, Haris Sohail fails to pick it up. He was shaping up to play it through the off-side and almost ends up getting beaten. He puts just enough bat on it to push it through cover
Pradeep to Haris Sohail, 1 run, tucks it to mid-on and completes a single
Pradeep to Haris Sohail, no run, punches it straight down the ground to mid-on
Pradeep to Haris Sohail, no run, length delivery around off, Haris Sohail stays in the crease and pushes it to the off-side

Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, out Caught by Shanaka!! Two wickets in two overs for Pradeep in this comeback spell. That makes things interesting. It was banged in short and was well wide of off, Fakhar Zaman gets under it and upper cuts it straight to the man at third man. It wasn't timed that well but the most surprising part was that he didn't put enough power behind the shot. Had he thrown his hands at it wildly, it might have sailed over. Fakhar Zaman c Shanaka b Pradeep 76(91) [4s-7 6s-1]
Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, no run, length delivery on the stumps, Fakhar Zaman stays put and defends it to the on-side
Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, no run, length delivery angling back into Fakhar Zaman, he misses the tuck. It struck him on the pads and it deflects away to the off-side
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, tossed up outside off, Zaman bends low and sweeps it to deep mid-wicket
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, no run, quicker and skidding on, Zaman camps back and defends down the wicket
Sandakan to Sarfaraz, byes, 1 run, googly and Sarfaraz is beaten all ends up, he moves forward to work it into the leg-side and is defeated by the away turn. The keeper also does not glove it cleanly
Sandakan to Sarfaraz, no run, flatter and on the stumps, Sarfaraz turns it towards mid-wicket
Sandakan to Sarfaraz, 2 runs, he will play the sweep, this was fuller than he would have liked and hence the under-edge towards backward square
Sandakan to Sarfaraz, wide, wrong 'un that turns away too much and goes past the tramline outside off, easy call

Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, dropped! It was a tough chance but you expect to take these at this level. Flighted outside off, Zaman reaches out to play the drive and the outside edge goes to the right of slip, the centurion sticks his right hand out and the ball does not stick. This would have turned the game on its head as it was a well-set Zaman who would have been sent back
Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, uses the away going angle and steers the good length delivery to third man
Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, no run, good length ball on leg-stump, Zaman defends it down the wicket

Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, no run, that's an ugly shot from Zaman, especially having lost Azam. Slanted across him and it was not short enough to play the pull/heave, he still goes for it and is beaten on the under-edge. Sarfaraz quickly walks up to have a word
Pradeep to Sarfaraz, 1 run, angled in on middle and leg, Sarfaraz works it into the vacant mid-wicket region

Pradeep to Sarfaraz, no run, oh! Pradeep almost had another. Good length ball in the channel around off-stump, Sarfaraz plays the wrong line and is beaten on the outside edge, the ball held its line and hence the Pakistan skipper was defeated

Pradeep to Babar Azam, out Lbw!! You gotta feel for umpire Joel Wilson. This was a 50-50 call because of the height but ball-tracking showed it to be hitting the top of middle. Anyway, it is another wrong decision that goes against his name. The nip-backer from Pradeep and Azam is not fully forward to deal with it, struck just above the kneeroll and height was always the question. Ball-tracking had three reds and Sri Lanka get their second successfull review. Babar Azam lbw b Pradeep 31(26) [4s-2]
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, no run, wrong 'un and Zaman stays back to knock it to mid-wicket
Sandakan to Babar Azam, 1 run, drifting in on leg-stump, Azam works it away to deep square leg
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, floated up outside off, Zaman drives uppishly but wide of cover
Sandakan to Babar Azam, 1 run, another drag down and this time Azam does not have the bounce to play the pull, mistimed to long-on
Sandakan to Babar Azam, 2 runs, half tracker and Azam thumps the cut in front of square, Pradeep runs across from sweeper cover and dives to make the stop, he saved a couple of runs there
Sandakan to Babar Azam, no run, flatter delivery around off, Azam punches it towards mid-wicket
Lahiru Kumara to Fakhar Zaman, 2 runs, slower delivery outside off, Zaman punches it wide of sweeper cover and scampers back for the second
Lahiru Kumara to Babar Azam, 1 run, short of length around off, Azam steers it away to third man

Lahiru Kumara to Babar Azam, FOUR, lovely shot! Overpitched and Azam ensures that it is put away. He got a big stride forward and creams the drive through the extra cover. And he just stood there and admired his work
Lahiru Kumara to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, short of length and Zaman pulls it along the ground to deep mid-wicket
Lahiru Kumara to Fakhar Zaman, no run, off-speed outside off, Zaman slashes and misses, undone by lack of pace
Lahiru Kumara to Fakhar Zaman, no run, back of a length on off, Zaman drops it near his feet and wants a single, sent back rightly
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, drifting on the pads and Zaman tucks it towards square leg
Sandakan to Babar Azam, 1 run, spinning into the pads and Azam nurdles it backward of square leg
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, goes for the big slog sweep and ends up dragging it towards backward square leg
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, no run, tossed up on off and middle, Zaman blocks it down the wicket
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, no run, slower and turning away, Zaman looks to cut and is beaten on the outside edge

Sandakan to Babar Azam, 5 runs, four runs gifted away. Azam comes down the track and isn't to the pitch, works it towards mid-wicket and there was a bit of hesitation, the throw goes to Zaman's end but it was a wild one - giving no chance for the backward point fielder to cover up
Lahiru Kumara to Babar Azam, 1 run, good length ball and Azam dabs it late to third man
Lahiru Kumara to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, fired at the pads at 141.7kph and Zaman tucks it to fine leg
Lahiru Kumara to Babar Azam, 1 run, short and down leg, Azam helps it along the way to fine leg
Lahiru Kumara to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, now the change of pace to which Zaman waits and steers to third man
Lahiru Kumara to Fakhar Zaman, byes, 2 runs, pacy bouncer and Zaman decides to take it on, easily beaten for pace and the ball flies over the top-edge, Bhanuka jumps up and gets some glove on it
Lahiru Kumara to Babar Azam, 1 run, short and outside off, Azam slashes hard and sends it to third man
Sandakan to Babar Azam, 1 run, short and outside off, Azam cracks the cut square and the sweeper tidies up

Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, 3 runs, wrong 'un and Zaman allowed it to spin in, opened the bat face and steered it past the slip fielder. Jayasuriya gives chase from backward point and saves a run for the team
Sandakan to Babar Azam, 1 run, throws it wide of off-stump and Azam drives it to sweeper cover
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, fuller in length and Zaman pushes it to the right of Sandakan, who cannot stop it with a slide
Sandakan to Babar Azam, 1 run, googly and Azam punches it with the spin towards sweeper cover
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, fraction short and Zaman slaps it to sweeper cover
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, wrong 'un turning away, Zaman directs it towards point

Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, FOUR, second boundary of the over as Zaman decides to take on Hasaranga. Lands it full and that allows Zaman to get under the ball, he then uses his power to heave it wide of long-on
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, no run, spinning in and Zaman's forward push is off the inside edge to mid-wicket
Wanidu Hasaranga to Babar Azam, 1 run, tossed up outside off, Azam eases it in front of square on the off-side

Wanidu Hasaranga to Babar Azam, FOUR, a couple of dots in the previous over and Azam thinks he has to take on the bowling. Shimmies down the wicket, gets close to the pitch of the ball and thumps it straight back over the umpire
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, low dipping full toss and Zaman whips it to deep mid-wicket
Sandakan to Babar Azam, no run, once more overpitches the delivery and Azam drives it straight back to Sandakan
Sandakan to Babar Azam, no run, comes down the track and closes the bat face to work the googly into the on-side, the leading edge pops up and lands well in front of the cover fielder
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, drifting on the pads and Zaman tucks it towards square leg
Sandakan to Babar Azam, 1 run, overcooks the flighted delivery and Azam drives it to long-on
Sandakan to Babar Azam, no run, tossed up around off, Azam defends with a straight bat
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, floated up outside off, Zaman eases it square on the off-side
Wanidu Hasaranga to Babar Azam, no run, wrong 'un outside off, Azam is solid in his forward block
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, gets a big stride forward and sweeps with the spin to deep backward square
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, no run, lovely drift across the left hander and Zaman defends down the wicket
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, no run, sharp turn and Zaman is on the forward press to ease it to long-off, but the spin in takes the inside edge and deflects onto the pad
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, no run, tossed up on off, Zaman inside halves the push to mid-wicket
Wanidu Hasaranga to Babar Azam, 1 run, flighted outside off and Azam eases the forward push past cover
Sandakan to Babar Azam, 1 run, once more leg-lined and Azam nurdles it backward of square, for a single
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, wrong 'un spinning into the pads, Zaman works it towards square leg
Sandakan to Babar Azam, 1 run, wrong 'un on leg-stump, Azam picked it neatly and nudged it square on the leg-side

Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, fifty for Zaman. This has been an hard fought innings. He struggled at the start but has battled on and now Pakistan will want him to carry on deep into the innings. A floaty delivery outside off and Zaman reaches out to loft it over extra cover, sliced over backward point and he is content with a single. Azam walks up for a handshake and Zaman then raises his bat to acknowledge the applause
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, no run, wrong 'un and Zaman didn't have a clue about it, stayed rooted to the crease and kept it out
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, no run, flighted outside off, Zaman thought it was short enough to cut and goes after it, beaten
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, fraction short and Zaman has space to maneuver this into the vacant point region
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, no run, shortens the length and cramps the left hander for room, Zaman knocks it back
Wanidu Hasaranga to Babar Azam, 1 run, floated up outside off and Azam takes it on the full, drives it to long-off

Wanidu Hasaranga to Abid Ali, out Lbw!! Umpire Joel Wilson's bad fortune has traveled all the way from England to Pakistan. Another one of his decisions has been overturned by DRS. It was the googly and Ali did not pick it, he went deep in the crease to work it into the off-side, beaten by the in-turn and struck low on the back pad, ball-tracking showed it to be hitting the leg-stump. Sri Lanka went for the review as soon as Wilson made his decision and were even celebrating before the ball-tracking came into the picture, that's how confident they were. A fine knock from Ali comes to an end. Abid Ali lbw b Wanidu Hasaranga 74(67) [4s-10]
Wanidu Hasaranga to Abid Ali, 2 runs, in the air and safe. Ali went for the slog sweep but the extra bounce on the leg-break foiled his shot, the top-edge lands safely near the deep mid-wicket region
Wanidu Hasaranga to Abid Ali, no run, looped up leg-break and Ali defends with an angled bat to backward point

Jayasuriya to Abid Ali, 3 runs, waits and waits to play the late cut, gets it fine past short third man and Kumara has a long chase, he just manages to get there and haul it in, saved a run for Sri Lanka
Jayasuriya to Abid Ali, no run, spinning in and Ali works it to mid-wicket, where the single is cut off
Jayasuriya to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, tossed up outside off, Zaman squeezes the drive to sweeper cover
Jayasuriya to Fakhar Zaman, no run, flatter in trajectory and Zaman knocks it straight to mid-wicket
Jayasuriya to Fakhar Zaman, no run, drifting in with the angle and Zaman defends it to mid-wicket
Jayasuriya to Abid Ali, 1 run, lands the flighted delivery on a fullish length and Ali eases it to long-on
Wanidu Hasaranga to Abid Ali, 1 run, fraction short and Ali chops the cut past backward point, for a single
Wanidu Hasaranga to Abid Ali, no run, wrong 'un and Ali did not pick it, he went for the drive against the spin and the inside edge thuds into the pad
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, quicker and skidding on, Zaman bunts it wide of cover
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, no run, oh! Zaman goes for the reverse sweep and is almost bowled behind his legs. The leg-break dips and turns in to beat the bat, goes past the leg-stump

Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, FOUR, edged and four. Hasaranga cannot believe it. The leg-break that turns in and Zaman plays inside the line, the outside edge runs away through the vacant slip region
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, no run, plays the late dab off the stumps towards backward point
Jayasuriya to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, drifts into the left hander and Zaman eases it down to long-on

Jayasuriya to Fakhar Zaman, FOUR, Pakistan keep collecting the boundary for the over. There was width on offer and Zaman decides to go over extra cover, used his reach and spanked it over the fielder, couple of bounces and into the fence
Jayasuriya to Abid Ali, 1 run, once again picks the length quickly and pulls it over mid-wicket, there's a fielder tidying up in the deep
Jayasuriya to Abid Ali, no run, spinning down leg and Ali gloves the sweep to short fine. It would have been a wide had he let go
Jayasuriya to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, flatter and sliding on, Zaman punches it down to long-on
Jayasuriya to Abid Ali, 1 run, fraction short and Ali almost falls over as he pulls it to deep backward square
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, FOUR, that's a proper Fakhar Zaman sweep shot. Goes down on his knees and absolutely nails it, beats the man at deep square leg and collects a boundary
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, no run, pushes it to the off-side

Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, FOUR, streaky but Fakhar Zaman would take it. It was wide of off, Fakhar Zaman goes back in the crease and outside edges the push. It beats the short third man fielder for a boundary
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, no run, full and wide of off, Fakhar Zaman reaches for it and pushes it away to cover
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, no run, another delivery spinning into Fakhar Zaman, he misses the inside edge and it raps him on the pads. Sliding down leg!
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, no run, full and spinning into Fakhar Zaman, he defends it back to the bowler
Jayasuriya to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, stays in the crease and tucks it to deep mid-wicket
Jayasuriya to Abid Ali, 1 run, turns it away from the short fine leg fielder using his wrists and takes a single
Jayasuriya to Abid Ali, no run, takes a good stride forward and works it straight to square leg
Jayasuriya to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, punched down the ground to long-off
Jayasuriya to Abid Ali, 1 run, punches it down the ground to long-on
Jayasuriya to Abid Ali, no run, goes back and works it to short fine leg
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, no run, blocked back to the bowler with a straight bat
Wanidu Hasaranga to Abid Ali, 3 runs, opens the face of the bat and steers it wide of short third man. It will be stopped inside the fence but Abid Ali will come back for a three
Wanidu Hasaranga to Abid Ali, no run, now, a wrong 'un from Wanidu Hasaranga! Abid Ali fails to pick it up and he was almost beaten, he manages to get some inside edge and that saves him
Wanidu Hasaranga to Abid Ali, no run, full and spinning away from Abid Ali, he comes on the front foot and pushes it away to backward point
Wanidu Hasaranga to Abid Ali, no run, this was wide of off and Abid Ali defends it to the off-side
Wanidu Hasaranga to Abid Ali, no run, defended back to the bowler
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, FOUR, Sandakan provides too much width to Zaman. He stays put in the crease and slaps it past backward point for another four!
Sandakan to Abid Ali, 1 run, it was spinning into Abid Ali and he works it to deep bakcward square leg
Sandakan to Abid Ali, no run, defends it to mid-wicket

Sandakan to Abid Ali, FOUR, Abid Ali paddles it away to fine leg, the fielding is poor again. He puts in a dive but fails to time the dive, the ball goes through him and Abid Ali collects another four
Sandakan to Abid Ali, 2 runs, flicked to deep square leg and he will come back for a brace
Sandakan to Abid Ali, no run, it spins away and beats the outside edge of Abid Ali

Wanidu Hasaranga to Abid Ali, 1 run, that's in the air and dropped. It was a filthy delivery - a full-toss on the stumps. Abid Ali dashed forward and wanted to clear the deep square leg, fails to time it and he didn't provide the requisite power too. It was in the air and the substitute fielder Sadeera Samarawickrama came under it but he ends up putting down a straight forward catch. Sri Lanka need to take every opportunity on offer to win this game and Sadeera Samarawickrama will be gutted with his effort!

Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, Wanidu Hasaranga provides a lot more revs on this delivery and it spins back in sharply, Fakhar Zaman was beaten for the turn and ends up inside edging it to the leg-side
Wanidu Hasaranga to Fakhar Zaman, no run, 82.1 kph delivery attacking the stumps, blocked back
Wanidu Hasaranga to Abid Ali, 1 run, goes back and punches it away to sweeper cover
Wanidu Hasaranga to Abid Ali, no run, steers it straight to cover
Wanidu Hasaranga to Abid Ali, no run, very full and on the stumps, pushes it back to the bowler
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, no run, beautifully bowled. It spins away from Fakhar Zaman and he drives it down the wrong line and it defeats his outside edge
Sandakan to Abid Ali, 1 run, takes out the cut shot again, straight to deep backward point this time

Sandakan to Abid Ali, FOUR, they say comebacks are tough but Abid Ali doesn't agree to it. He has looked immensely confident right from the word go and has blazed away to his fifty! Goes back on that delivery which had width and he cuts it wide of backward point for a boundary
Sandakan to Abid Ali, no run, Sandakan gives flight on this delivery, Abid Ali was shaping up to sweep but he changed his mind and defends it to the off-side
Sandakan to Abid Ali, no run, goes back in the crease and pushes it to mid-off
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, this one didn't turn, Fakhar Zaman pushes forward and he inside edges it to the leg-side
Lahiru Kumara to Abid Ali, no run, Lahiru Kumara decides to bowl full and Abid Ali mistimes the drive straight to cover
Lahiru Kumara to Abid Ali, no run, banged in short again and Abid Ali ducks again. It wasn't too short to be called a wide
Lahiru Kumara to Abid Ali, wide, bangs it short and it ends up being too short. Abid Ali ducks and umpire signals it as a wide

Lahiru Kumara to Abid Ali, FOUR, oh! This is brilliant from Abid Ali. He takes a good stride forward and flays into the cover drive, beats the man at cover and it races away to the fence. He is making batting look too easy at the moment!
Lahiru Kumara to Abid Ali, no run, a good looking cover-drive, finds the man at cover

Lahiru Kumara to Abid Ali, FOUR, Sri Lankan pacers are not learning from their mistake. This time, Lahiru Kumara errs in line and delivers it well down the leg-side. Abid Ali gets in a good position and tucks it wide of fine leg
Lahiru Kumara to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, dabs it to third man

Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, now, a wrong'un. Fakhar Zaman picks it up off the pitch and pushes it to mid-on. Abid Ali was ball watching and he was off the mark very late. Luckily for Abid Ali the man at mid-on was deep so despite starting late, he had the time to complete the single

Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, SIX, too much flight from Sandakan this time, Fakhar Zaman dashes forward to reach close to the ball. He wasn't entirely to the pitch still goes through with the whack over deep mid-wicket and gets enough power behind it to clear the ropes!
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, no run, this was a wrong 'un, Fakhar Zaman defends it to the on-side
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, no run, full and on the stumps, defends it to the off-side
Sandakan to Fakhar Zaman, no run, 81.5 kph delivery spinning away from Fakhar Zaman, he misses the cut and it goes past the outside edge
Sandakan to Abid Ali, 1 run, it was spinning into the pads and Abid Ali clips it wide of short fine leg

Lahiru Kumara to Fakhar Zaman, 2 runs, thumped wide of deep mid-wicket by staying in the crease - trademark Fakhar Zaman! The fielder at deep mid-wicket charges to his left and puts in a brillant dive to stop it from reaching the fence
Lahiru Kumara to Abid Ali, 1 run, back of a length delivery around off and Abid Ali punches it straight to backward point. A bit of a misfield there and Abid Ali will collect a single
Lahiru Kumara to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, length delivery attacking the stumps and Fakhar Zaman clips it to the on-side
Lahiru Kumara to Abid Ali, 1 run, length delivery down the leg-side and he tucks it to backward square leg

Lahiru Kumara to Abid Ali, FOUR, Sri Lankan bowlers are throwing a party to Abid Ali here! It was on the pads again and was bowled at over 140 kph so Abid Ali just has to touch it, he provides no power on the whip it still races to the fence because of the pace of Lahiru Kumara!
Lahiru Kumara to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, Fakhar Zaman opens the face of the bat to guide it to third man
Pradeep to Abid Ali, no run, finally, he gets it right. It was a back of a length delivery around off and Abid Ali punches it straight to the cover fielder

Pradeep to Abid Ali, FOUR, and again, could you believe it? Pradeep is not learning from his mistake at all, offers a proper freebie down the leg-side and Abid Ali obliges by clipping it fine of the fine leg fielder. He is off to a flyer here!
Pradeep to Abid Ali, FOUR, this is poor from Pradeep. He yet again, throws one on the pads. Abid Ali gets in the position quickly and whips it wide of mid-wicket for another boundary
Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, another delivery down the leg-side and Fakhar Zaman this time manages to flick it to deep mid-wicket
Pradeep to Abid Ali, 1 run, length delivery drifting down the leg-side, Abid Ali whips it to short fine leg for a single

Pradeep to Abid Ali, FOUR, a textbook straight drive from Abid Ali! On a length and on the stumps, Abid Ali takes a stride forward and flays into the drive like a boss. It was timed so well that it reached the long-on fence in a whisker. He enjoyed it too and holds his pose for the cameramen!
Shanaka to Fakhar Zaman, no run, stays static in the crease and drives it straight to mid-on
Shanaka to Abid Ali, 1 run, good length delivery attacking the stumps, Abid Ali tucks it away to deep square leg and collects a single

Shanaka to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, oh dear! That was a streaky single. Fakhar Zaman taps it to backward point with soft hands and charges for a quick single. Hasaranga at backward point picks it up cleanly but fails to nail the direct hit at the striker's end. Had he nailed the direct hit, Abid Ali might have been in trouble
Shanaka to Fakhar Zaman, no run, mistimes the punch to cover
Shanaka to Fakhar Zaman, FOUR, this will give him confidence. He stays put on this delivery and pumps it straight down the ground for a boundary. Almost a flat-batted forehand from Fakhar Zaman!
Shanaka to Abid Ali, 1 run, throws it wide of off and gets it to shape away from the right-hander, Abid Ali throws his bat at it. It comes off the outside half of the bat and ends up at third man
Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, no run, this was drifting onto the pads and Fakhar Zaman yet again missed the whip off his pads. He looks seriously out of touch!
Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, no run, length delivery wide of off, Fakhar Zaman cuts it straight to backward point

Pradeep to Abid Ali, 3 runs, not a great deal of room provided but Abid Ali makes his own room and takes out the punch shot again. He finds the gap wide of cover this time. It won't reach the fence but Abid Ali will collect three!
Pradeep to Abid Ali, no run, back of a length delivery wide of off, Abid Ali punches it straight to mid-on and shouts a loud no
Pradeep to Abid Ali, no run, just a forward press from Abid Ali, he allows the ball to come and defends it to the on-side
Pradeep to Abid Ali, no run, fuller length delivery on the stumps, Abid Ali offers the straight bat and blocks it back to mid-on
Shanaka to Abid Ali, 1 run, this one was drifting onto the pads and Abid Ali tucks it to backward square leg
Shanaka to Abid Ali, no run, on a length and targeting the stumps, Abid Ali gets behind it and defends it solidly

Shanaka to Abid Ali, 2 runs, this one skids off the deck and Abid Ali was late on the pull shot, he miscues it but gets just about enough bat on it to clear mid-wicket and hw will come back for a double
Shanaka to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, very full and down the leg-side, Fakhar Zaman clips it to fine leg

Shanaka to Fakhar Zaman, no run, again, a bit of inward shape for Shanaka. Fakhar Zaman missed the flick and he was rapped on the pads. Shanaka appealed but umpire wasn't keen. Sliding down leg, it pitched outside leg too!
Shanaka to Fakhar Zaman, no run, full and curving back into Fakhar Zaman, he mistimes the punch to cover
Pradeep to Abid Ali, no run, length delivery around off, Abid Ali defends it to the off-side
Pradeep to Abid Ali, no run, length delivery on the stumps, Abid Ali defends it back
Pradeep to Abid Ali, FOUR, picks it up off the hips and whips it away wide of mid-wicket for another four. Pradeep errs in line and Abid Ali makes full use of it
Pradeep to Abid Ali, FOUR, picture-perfect straight drive! Very full from Pradeep, Abid Ali comes forward and straight drives it with a lot of class and elegance for a boundary
Pradeep to Abid Ali, no run, fuller length delivery wide of off, Abid Ali blocks it back to the bowler with a straight bat
Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, 1 run, punched down the ground wide of mid-off
Shanaka to Abid Ali, no run, overpitched delivery wide of off, Abid Ali drives it straight, it ends up being too straight as Shanaka fields it
Shanaka to Abid Ali, no run, full and targeting the stumps, Abid Ali stays put and pushes it away to mid-on
Shanaka to Abid Ali, no run, length delivery wide of off, Abid Ali presses forward and defends it straight to cover
Shanaka to Abid Ali, 2 runs, short delivery without much venom, Abid Ali pulled it away wide of fine leg and he will come back for a brace
Shanaka to Abid Ali, no run, full and wide of off, Abid Ali comes forward and defends it to cover with a straight bat
Shanaka to Abid Ali, no run, full and wide of off, Abid Ali was slightly late to come on the front foot and mistimes the drive to mid-off
Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, no run, Pradeep starts with a maiden. Fakhar Zaman stays static in the crease and punches it straight down the ground to mid-on
Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, no run, it was full and was very wide, Fakhar Zaman tries his best to reach it but was unable to do so. Ends up making no contact and Bhanuka collects it
Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, no run, Pradeep bowls it full and attacks the stumps, Fakhar Zaman lets it come and eases it straight to the cover fielder
Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, no run, on a length and around off, Fakhar Zaman pushes it to cover
Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, no run, back of a length on off-stump, Zaman is right behind the line to defend
Pradeep to Fakhar Zaman, no run, good length ball outside off, Zaman has a sighter and lets it pass. Good carry through to Bhanuka as he collects it in front of his face
